# Results Analysis


## Examples from Ryan

Ryan made a nice start on some basic line plots that we can build on
from here.
```{r}
golf_data <- tribble(
  ~name, ~day, ~pos, ~icon,
  "T", "1", 104, NA,
  "C", "1", 102, NA,
  "I", "1", 145, NA,
  "J", "1", 164, NA,
  "R", "1", 170, NA,
  # Day Two
  "T", "2", 67, "/home/rbatten/learning-r/masterChirpsRBcalcs/masters-jacket.png",
  "C", "2", 121, NA,
  "I", "2", 200, NA,
  "J", "2", 109, NA,
  "R", "2", 117, NA
)

ggplot(golf_data,
       mapping = aes(x = day, y = pos,
                                group = name)) +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  geom_line(aes(color = name)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal() +
  ggtitle("Master's Pool Results") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("T" = "#006B54", "C" = "#DC4605",
                                "I" = "#007298", "J" = "#ED8B00",
                                "R" = "#002F6C")) +
  geom_image(aes(image = icon), size = 0.05)

```
